metadata.name: HackTool - CrackMapExec File Indicators
metadata.comment: Detects file creation events with filename patterns used by CrackMapExec.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND startswith(lower(file.path), lower('c:\\windows\\temp\\')) AND (endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\temp.ps1')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\msol.ps1')) OR file.path rlike '\\\\\[0-9a-f\]\{8\}-\[0-9a-f\]\{4\}-\[0-9a-f\]\{4\}-\[0-9a-f\]\{4\}-\[0-9a-f\]\{12\}\\.txt$' AND file.path rlike '\\\\\[a-zA-Z\]\{8\}\\.tmp$'))

output.summary: Detects file creation events with filename patterns used by CrackMapExec.
